CmdLine: apk --update add       krb5 python2 py2-cryptography py2-yaml &&     apk add --virtual .build-pytools       build-base git krb5-dev py2-pip python2-dev &&     git clone --recurse-submodules --single-branch 'https://github.com/HariSekhon/pytools.git' /pytools ;     pip install beautifulsoup4 blessings docker requests_kerberos ;     apk del --purge .build-pytools ;     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* ;     /pytools/dockerhub_show_tags.py alpine
